Detailed Description

A trace file class : Util::TraceFile.

This class is used to overload input operator to read event codes from a file.

Reading of value is done by binary read from trace file for static sized contiguous type using the templated operator >>. This template must be specialized for specific needs. This is the case for the std::string type.
